attributes.action: Prevent police informants with violent criminal records receiving large cash payments from the police
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It's a no brainer. The police pay violent criminals to snitch on non violent criminals. Upon the conviction of the non violent offenders, the police then pay the informant, sometimes vast amounts of money.
The violent informant also has immunity from typical criminal procedures & if convicted is often given an extremely lenient prison sentence. 
In my mind, the police and criminal element of society should not be allowed to "work together."
No matter what the circumstance.
